faqs.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a more comprehensive package at any time by paying the difference.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden charges?
faqs.answer: No, our pricing is transparent. University application fees and external test fees are not included.
